Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Lavoie
Reviews.Content: Good camera system once it's up and running there are no actual instructions with this unit so you pretty much guess as you go thankfully it's layout was similar to my old dvr system so I was able to get the main things set upGetting the remote viewing up however is a challenge if you don't know much about routers and port forwarding it was very frustrating for a few days but I with give credit to customer service it took a few days to revive a call after I put an email ticket in but once I got the call it got setup and fully working unfortunately if you use an iphone they only have 1 app that works to view on and it's not the best quality app the viewing from a computer is very good and you can fully controll the dvr's settings as well as if you where in front of it not 100 miles away

Reviews.Title: great sys.
Reviews.Author: dan walton
Reviews.Content: This sys. is more then I would ever need.  It has a very good and clear picture. A good home sys.  Thanks...

Reviews.Title: defender DVR
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent and easy to use system. Set up took less than 30 minutes and at no time was I confused.

Reviews.Title: Defender 4 channel
Reviews.Author: lmassman
Reviews.Content: The menu is a bit hard to travel through to find or review recorded eventsNot friendlyOther than that I would recommend that you get recorder with out camerasBy your ones you need and connect to defender

ProductInfo.Features:
View anytime, anywhere with remote viewing via internet, smartphone, and tablet
Record over 2 years' worth of footage on the included 500 GB hard drive
Choose motion-activated recording or H.264 compression to maximize storage space
ProductInfo.Name: DEFENDER 21011 SENTINEL 4-Channel Smart Security DVR
